short_summary: Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply and delivery of bear spray attack deterrent and bear spray holsters.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on October 5, 2022 by 14:00 EDT. The procurement is for Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply and delivery of bear spray attack deterrent and bear spray holsters required by Parks Canada located in Banff, AB, Canada.
tags: Regional Individual Standing Offer - Banff, AB
